about_the_game:
In Defendópolis, you are the last line of defense for a peaceful village under constant attack by menacing monsters. Take control in this third-person tower defense experience, with vibrant and colorful cartoon graphics, as you strategically build defenses and face increasingly challenging waves of enemies.

Key Features:

  • Third-Person Tower Defense: Control your character directly while building and placing towers to defend the village. Switch perspectives and get involved in the action!

  • Cartoon-Style Graphics: A lighthearted and colorful visual style that makes the game fun and accessible for players of all ages.

  • Strategic Defense: Place towers in key positions to maximize their impact, while using special abilities to take down enemies directly.

  • Hordes of Enemies: Face a variety of monsters, each with unique abilities and increasing levels of challenge.

  • Progressive Growth: Unlock new towers, abilities, and upgrades as you defend your village from increasingly powerful waves of enemies.

  • Casual and Fun Gameplay: Easy to pick up, yet challenging enough to keep players engaged as the difficulty ramps up.

Get ready to protect your home in Defendópolis, where every choice counts, and each new wave of monsters is more dangerous than the last!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 360 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
